video_prompt: Two explorers move into a crumbling hall, their gaze rising to a pulsating cyan starburst and descending DNA-like helix. Glowing crystals shimmer on the floor. Skeletal figures subtly shift in the periphery. Misty blue haze expands beyond the columns. The vibrant celestial display subtly changes as the explorers behold it.
image_prompt: A grand, crumbling hall within a cavern, featuring a vaulted domed ceiling adorned with glowing cyan celestial projections and a double helix-like tube. Two backpackers stand on a rock-strewn floor with glowing blue crystals, gazing up at the mystical display. Skeletal figures are scattered throughout the scene. Dominated by brilliant cyan light against a dark, dramatic ambiance. Backlit, intricate architectural details, dark green vines. Vertical shot.
refined_video_prompt: Explorers step forward, their gazes slowly ascending towards a pulsating cyan starburst and a spiraling DNA-like helix. Glowing crystals continually shimmer on the floor. Skeletal figures subtly shift in the periphery. A misty blue haze expands and flows beyond the columns. The vibrant celestial display subtly alters its patterns, evoking a visible shift in the explorers' expressions.
